p: The IPVG also recommends using common terminology such as the terminology proposed by the CIOMS VIII working group [ 11] or EU-GVP Module IX [ 9] to avoid misunderstandings in reportability of signals to NRAs. The term “emerging safety issue” (ESI) [ 12] should only be used for the most serious risks where an immediate in-market action is required to protect patients and public health.
